title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: Do Business With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us            Do Business With Us       Business operations are permitted on a case-by-case basis. Please contact Cedar Breaks' Park  Headquarters in Cedar City for more information on how to obtain a Commercial Use Authorization (CUA). Please note that any use of federal lands for other than recreational purposes requires a permit per 36 CFR 5 et. al.
